de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.adapter.data

Class ImComponentFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.adapter.data.ImComponentFactory

  • public final class ImComponentFactory
extends Object
    Factory utility to create a certain component object holding an integrity message for a component.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int MESSAGE_TYPE_MASK

      Private constructor should never be invoked.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ImObjectComponent changeAttributesFromComponent(ImObjectComponent component, List<? extends ImAttribute> attributes)
      Changes the attributes of a component by making a shallow copy of the object and replacing the attributes, because a component object is immutable.

      Creates a component holding integrity measurement attributes as parsed objects as well as the necessary objects for error handling.

      Creates a component holding the message as raw byte array using legacy addressing.

    • Method Detail

      • createObjectComponent

        public static ImObjectComponent createObjectComponent(byte imFlags,
                                      long vendorId,
                                      long type,
                                      long collectorId,
                                      long validatorId,
                                      List<? extends ImAttribute> attributes)
        Creates a component holding integrity measurement attributes as parsed objects.
        Parameters:
        imFlags - the message flags as composed byte
        vendorId - the vendor ID describing the component
        type - the type ID describing the component
        collectorId - the referred IMC
        validatorId - the referred IMV
        attributes - the measurement attributes
        Returns:
        the component object

      • createFaultyObjectComponent

        public static ImFaultyObjectComponent createFaultyObjectComponent(byte imFlags,
                                                  long vendorId,
                                                  long type,
                                                  long collectorId,
                                                  long validatorId,
                                                  List<? extends ImAttribute> attributes,
                                                  List<ValidationException> exceptions,
                                                  byte[] messageHeader)
        Creates a component holding integrity measurement attributes as parsed objects as well as the necessary objects for error handling.
        Parameters:
        imFlags - the message flags as composed byte
        vendorId - the vendor ID describing the component
        type - the type ID describing the component
        collectorId - the referred IMC
        validatorId - the referred IMV
        attributes - the measurement attributes
        exceptions - the list of minor exception
        messageHeader - the raw message header
        Returns:
        the component object

      • createRawComponent

        public static ImRawComponent createRawComponent(byte imFlags,
                                long vendorId,
                                long type,
                                long collectorId,
                                long validatorId,
                                byte[] message)
        Creates a component holding the message as raw byte array.
        Parameters:
        imFlags - the message flags as composed byte
        vendorId - the vendor ID describing the component
        type - the type ID describing the component
        collectorId - the referred IMC
        validatorId - the referred IMV
        message - the raw message
        Returns:
        the component object

      • createLegacyRawComponent

        public static ImRawComponent createLegacyRawComponent(long messageType,
                                      byte[] message)
        Creates a component holding the message as raw byte array using legacy addressing.
        The message type is a 32 bit unsigned number and consists of a 24 bit number in the higher order bits for the vendor ID and a 8 bit number in the lower order bits for the message type ID

        For example combined message type ID = 0x00559701:

        RadixVendor ID Message
        type ID
        16005597 01
        1021911 1

        Parameters:
        messageType - the combined message type
        message - the raw message
        Returns:
        the component object

      • changeAttributesFromComponent

        public static ImObjectComponent changeAttributesFromComponent(ImObjectComponent component,
                                              List<? extends ImAttribute> attributes)
        Changes the attributes of a component by making a shallow copy of the object and replacing the attributes, because a component object is immutable.
        Parameters:
        component - the component to change
        attributes - the attributes to insert
        Returns:
        the component object
